name: Tinkr Garage
description:
Tinkr Garage is a Massive Multiplayer Vehicular Sandbox! Customize your own vehicle, race with your friends, roam the landscape, battle against teams and even battle against the hazards of the environment.

Player Versus Player, Player Versus Environment.... the road long and the challenges are tough, so make your name known!

The current build includes,
5 major vehicle types: Roadster, Minibus, Truck, ATV and Tractor
Vehicle Customization: changing paints, wheels, lights and stickers
Big map - 2 Km x 2 Km, comprised of Skateboard park, Battle Arena, Race Track, Soccer Field and more
4 weapon types and many other game objects to interact with
